donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Component 2: Support to construction of Drying floor, Storage facilities (Large warehouses at processing sites) and markets (UNDP C.02.02)
Addressing the specific structural barriers facing women in agricultural production, their workload and other social roles, is a key component to reduce food insecurity and address malnutrition at household levels. Construction of warehouses for the storage of farm produce will reduce post harvest losses as the women will have access to storage facilities as soon as they harvest their produce. UNDP will support the construction of drying floors, primary storage structures and be responsible for building and rehabilitating markets. The location of both markets and warehouses will be jointly identified by MOA, MOGD and MIA.
